# relations.reunmatches_relation { #fave_recode.relations.reunmatches_relation }

`relations.reunmatches_relation(lhs, rhs)`

Does the lhs *not* match a regex for the rhs

## Parameters

| Name   | Type         | Description     | Default    |
|--------|--------------|-----------------|------------|
| `lhs`  | [str](`str`) | left hand side  | _required_ |
| `rhs`  | [str](`str`) | right hand side | _required_ |

## Returns

| Type           | Description   |
|----------------|---------------|
| [bool](`bool`) | True or False |
